item.title: 1.3.67 णेरणौ यत् कर्म णौ चेत् स कर्ताऽनाध्याने
3.3.116 कर्मणि च येन संस्पर्शात्‌ कर्तुः शरीरसुखम्
3.4.2 क्रियासमभिहारे लोट्; लोटो हिस्वौ; वा च तध्वमोः
4.3.100 जनपदिनां जनपदवत्‌ सर्वं जनपदेन समानशब्दानां बहुवचने
4.4.125 तद्वानासामुपधानो मन्त्र इतीष्टकासु लुक् च मतोः
7.3.3 न य्वाभ्यां पदान्ताभ्याम् पूर्वौ तु ताभ्यामैच्
8.2.42 रदाभ्यां निष्ठातो नः पूर्वस्य च दः
About
item.description: Intro Welcome! We are a few open source sanskrit programmers, and this is our centralized repository + user inteface of data pertaining to the ashtadhyayi and its commentaries. We welcome you to contribute corrections to the content or improvements to the UI. Motivation This data is presented in many places on the internet (wikisource, sanskritdocuments.org, avg-sanskrit, ashtadhyayi.com etc..), but there was no centralized place where corrections and curations could happen in a crowdsourced yet controlled fashion.
